word:
Finding Rest in Labor for Souls 

     Scarcely a week passed following her arrival at the home of her son, Elder W. C. White, in Oakland, Cal., before Mrs. White attended a camp meeting held in Sacramento, October 13-25. On nearly every day of the meeting she spoke to the people, and during the 
                                                                           259
last Sunday afternoon gave a temperance address to an audience numbering upwards of five thousand.
